text: Mary Rodgers (January 11, 1931 â€“ June 26, 2014) was an American composer, author, and screenwriter. She was known for her novel Freaky Friday. Her best- known musicals were Once Upon a Mattress and The Mad Show. Rodgers died from heart failure at her home in Manhattan on June 26, 2014 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American composers Category:American children's writers Category:Screenwriters from New York City
title: Mary Rodgers
